reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one mentioning it hits below the knees, and they appreciate its comfort, softness, and good quality. The design is stylish, and they like the pockets. However, the material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's quite thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and sharp looking.
items.body: Dress looks so good on. I wear tights with it because I stay cold. Great wear for the money. Itâ€™s of good quality and feels good on. Very flowy and free feeling!!! Great value!!! Read more
items.author: Doris Gregory Kearney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this dress!
items.body: I love this dress so much! Great fabric weight, not too heavy and not too light. While light, it's definitely not see through. It's warm enough to wear alone or with a jacket. It's long enough that it can be worn with or without tights. It hits below the knees on me ans i'm 5'4. It's adorable with boots of any style. It has pockets, which is so great. The pockets are big enough to hold a phone. Read more
items.author: Katy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but big
items.body: I generally wear a 2x in everything but this had a little extra room around the waist. Iâ€™m 5â€™1â€ and it came down to my shins. The fabric isnâ€™t a super high quality but the dress is soft and really comfy to wear, and the sleeves werenâ€™t tight and were nice and long. Iâ€™d buy it in more colors. For the price itâ€™s a cute, comfortable buy. Didnâ€™t seem to shrink in the wash, and it hasnâ€™t pilled too badly after about 2 months, the fabric also is nice and stretchy. Read more
items.author: Brittany Burcroff

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, lightweight and versatile
items.body: Very lightweight and soft. Static wasn't a huge issue, so it is able to be flowing some with cotton leggings. I like to layer it with other clothes and the collar is loose enough to look classic with a collared shirt. With it being thin, I would definitely think you need a tank or something underneath. I wanted it oversized & I bought 3xl which works nice and loose for me. I personally have curves, broad shoulders/ hips, a wider booty and it is nicely A-lined. I usually get xl-2xl in US sizes to avoid having clothes cling anywhere, but I honestly could've gone a size or maybe even 2 down and I think it would be more streamlined on top to wear dressed up with a belt or blazer. Read more
items.author: CatFigaro

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not plus size
items.body: Not plus size. Material is thick and soft. Color was as advertised. Not really flattering as it clung to my body in not a good way. Read more
items.author: Devon Faddis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: V6-beige, V-heather Black, V2-wine Red, V2-dark Green, V2-dark Gray, V-rust Red, V6-dark Green, Coffee Brown, V-bordeaux Red, V-grape Purple, V-deep Coffee, V-wine Red, V-black, V2-mocha. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
